result.title: Inventory of IM in Europe
result.description: D12 will compile the first comprehensive userfriendly and openly accessible European database incl a series of maps and infographics for innovative economic mechanisms that incentivise FES provision in Europe The inventory will be representative of the sector waterbased FES biodiversity carbon sequestration location payment vehicle governance system etc

result.title: Analysis relating forest ecosystem services and the location of IM across Europe
result.description: D1.3 will integrate maps of individual FES and maps of innovative IM to perform a “gap” analysis that identifies areas where mismatches occur between supply and demand (e.g. regarding particular ecosystem services or particular forest types).
